description: Warm, comfortable jacket in two-layer pile fleece made from recycled polyester. Structured outside with a flat-knitted jersey inside. Chest pocket in G-1000 Eco with flap and buttoned closure, and two zippered hand pockets. Full-length zipper at the front makes it easy to regulate warmth. Perfect as a robust, warm mid layer on cold winter days and also works well as a jacket in milder temperatures.
name: Fjallraven Vardag Pile Fleece - Mens
